content.description: This is a bottomed out overhanging flared hand crack. It has a hard and tricky crux right away, and after that backs off to flared 5.11- hands to the top. Start with a hand in the fattest section of the lowest pod with the other hand below that pod. A bit of an eliminate, the seam to the left is off. This was an old project.
content.location: This is on the obvious overhanging boulder about a hundred yards off the road as you head down hill toward the Crow Creek crossing.  It should stand out because it has a couple of prominent looking cracks on it that face the road.  If you have ever driven down the Vedauwoo road looking for cracks to boulder, you have probably walked up to this boulder.  The Process of Belief is the right most crack.
